General.Name: Nanjing Chervon Auto Precision Technology Co Ltd
General.Description: Nanjing Chervon Auto Precision Technology Co., Ltd. engages in the research and development, production, and sale of automotive components for use in middle and high-end cars in China and internationally. It offers engine components, such as sprocket, throttle body, turbo housing, and EGR housing; transmission products, including transfer case housing, ring gear, spline shaft, gear, and valve body products; and e-mobility products comprising motor shaft and housing, gear box housing, monoblock, inverter housing, radiator, batholith, and cooler assembly products. The company also provides steering and brake parts, which include worm shaft, pinion, and steering nuts; heat exchange products consisting of end cover, cylinder block, and compressor housing; dual clutch transmission products; hydraulic retarders; engine emission control devices; and motor management systems, as well as components for household appliances. In addition, it produces various parts and components for washing machines; and offers aluminum alloy and ferrous metal auto parts for use in heat exchange systems, transmission systems, steering and braking systems, engine systems, and motors and electronic control systems of new energy vehicles. Further, the company is involved in the design and manufacture of precision molds, and fixtures and inspection tools for automobiles and motorcycles. Nanjing Chervon Auto Precision Technology Co., Ltd. was founded in 2012 and is based in Nanjing, China.
